region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby Entrance
Bottom of the Well Lobby Perimeter

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Entrance: is_child and (Bottom_of_the_Well_Dungeon_Map or logic_lens_botw or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby SE Crawl Space: 'Bottom of the Well Lower Water' and is_child
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Water Grate: 'Bottom of the Well Lower Water' or is_child or can_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots)
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: transition('Bottom of the Well T12', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement First Finger: transition('Bottom of the Well T09', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby Central

exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: transition('Bottom of the Well T08', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement Ceiling: transition('Bottom of the Well T10', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well East Inner Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T04', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well West Inner Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T05', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby Central West Cage

exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: transition('Bottom of the Well T08', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well East Cage

locations.Bottom of the Well GS Like Like Cage: can_use(Boomerang) or (logic_botw_cage_gs and (can_child_attack or is_adult)) or can_use(Hookshot)

exits.Bottom of the Well Beamos Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T02', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby NE Crawl Space

exits.Bottom of the Well Beamos Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T03', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby SE Crawl Space

exits.Bottom of the Well Dead Hand Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T07', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Lobby SW Fake Wall
Bottom of the Well Lobby Water Grate

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Perimeter: 'Bottom of the Well Lower Water' or is_child or can_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots)
exits.Bottom of the Well Coffin Room: transition('Bottom of the Well T06', True)

events.Bottom of the Well Third Finger Rocks:
Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Dins_Fire)
                or (logic_botw_basement and can_use(Sticks))

locations.Bottom of the Well Map Chest: can_blast_or_smash or ('Bottom of the Well Third Finger Rocks' and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade)

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Perimeter: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T12', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Central: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T08', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Central West Ca: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T08', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby SW Fake Wall:
transition('Bottom of the Well T01', 'Bottom of the Well Room 01 Silver Rupees'
				or 'Bottom of the Well Room 01 T01 Unbar')
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement First Finger: 'Bottom of the Well First Finger Rocks'
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement Third Finger: 'Bottom of the Well Third Finger Rocks'
exits.Bottom of the Well East Inner Room: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T11', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Basement Ceiling

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Central: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T10', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Basement First Finger

exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: 'Bottom of the Well First Finger Rocks'
exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Perimeter: False and transition('Bottom of the Well T09', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Basement Third Finger

events.Bottom of the Well Third Finger Rocks: Progressive_Strength_Upgrade or can_blast_or_smash or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_use(Bow)

exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: 'Bottom of the Well Third Finger Rocks'
exits.Bottom of the Well Beamos Room:
False and (transition('Bottom of the Well T13', True)
				or transition('Bottom of the Well T14', True)
				or transition('Bottom of the Well T15', True))

region_name: Bottom of the Well Coffin Room

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Water Grate: transition('Bottom of the Well T06', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Beamos Room

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby NE Crawl Space:
(logic_lens_botw or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))
				and transition('Bottom of the Well T03', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well East Cage:
(logic_lens_botw or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))
				and transition('Bottom of the Well T02', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement Third Finger:
transition('Bottom of the Well T13', True)
				or transition('Bottom of the Well T14', True)
				or transition('Bottom of the Well T15', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well Dead Hand Room

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby SE Crawl Space:
transition('Bottom of the Well T07', 'Bottom of the Well Room 04 Enemies'
				or 'Bottom of the Well Room 04 T07 Unbar')

region_name: Bottom of the Well East Inner Room

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Central: transition('Bottom of the Well T04', True)
exits.Bottom of the Well Basement: transition('Bottom of the Well T11', True)

region_name: Bottom of the Well West Inner Room

locations.Deku Baba Nuts:
is_adult or Slingshot or Sticks or 
                has_explosives or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire)

exits.Bottom of the Well Lobby Central: transition('Bottom of the Well T05', True)
